page.title: 10Patterns of work
page.content: There are 23 houses in the South East part of Ogbourne st George village.I looked at the way the people were employed and I found that 7 people were retired from work and I couldnt find out about 1 person. Some people are paid for their work and some people work without pay. The people who work for money do a lot of different work, such as doctor garage owner,steward,farmer, secretary, gas worker and cleaner. Most of the people who are paid work outside the village in the nearby town of Marlborough. The people who work without pay are mainly housewives or house-keepers.
